JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Searching for bartender for restaurant in Copenhagen
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for someone who is interested in preparing alcohol or non-alcohol beverages for bar and restaurant patrons and provide a great guest experience. We prefer if you have exerpeince in using ingredients to prepare cocktails.

  • Mixing beverages using an extensive range of ingredients including liquor, bitters, soda, water, sugar, and fruits
  • Taking beverage orders from customers or wait staff and serving drinks as requested, paying extreme attention to detail
  • Satisfying patron requests in a timely manner

We are looking for part-time and full-time candidates. You can do this as a studentjob or as your career. We are very flexible. 

You need to be able to speak English. Danish is a plus. 

Please contact the manager Judith with any questions.
